00023    /*
00024    * Constructor.
00025    */
00026    AtomDistributor::AtomDistributor() :
00027       #ifdef UTIL_MPI 
00028       sendArrays_(),
00029       sendSizes_(),
00030       #endif
00031       boundaryPtr_(0),
00032       domainPtr_(0),
00033       storagePtr_(0),
00034       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00035       bufferPtr_(0),
00036       #endif
00037       newPtr_(0),
00038       cacheCapacity_(0),
00039       sendCapacity_(0),
00040       rankMaxSendSize_(0),
00041       nCachedTotal_(0),
00042       nSentTotal_(0)

00051    /*
00052    * Retain pointers to associated objects.
00053    */
00054    void AtomDistributor::associate(Domain& domain, Boundary& boundary, 
00055                                    AtomStorage& storage, Buffer& buffer)
00056    {
00057       domainPtr_ = &domain;
00058       boundaryPtr_ = &boundary;
00059       storagePtr_ = &storage;
00060       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00061       bufferPtr_ = &buffer;
00062       #endif
00063    }

00065    /*
00066    * Set cache capacity and allocate all required memory.
00067    */
00068    void AtomDistributor::initialize(int cacheCapacity)
00069    {
00070       cacheCapacity_ = cacheCapacity;
00071       allocate();
00072    }
00073 
00074    /*
00075    * Read cacheCapacity and allocate all required memory.
00076    */
00077    void AtomDistributor::readParam(std::istream& in)
00078    {
00079       // Read parameter file block
00080       readBegin(in, "AtomDistributor");
00081       read<int>(in, "cacheCapacity", cacheCapacity_);
00082       readEnd(in);
00083  
00084       // Do actual allocation
00085       allocate();
00086    }
00087 
00088    /*
00089    * Allocate memory and initialize state (private method).
00090    */
00091    void AtomDistributor::allocate()
00092    {
00093       // Preconditions
00094       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00095          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor not initialized");
00096       }
00097       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00098          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00099       }
00100       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00101       if (!bufferPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00102          UTIL_THROW("Buffer not initialized");
00103       }
00104       #endif
00105 
00106       int gridSize  = domainPtr_->grid().size();
00107       int rank      = domainPtr_->gridRank();
00108       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00109       sendCapacity_ = bufferPtr_->atomCapacity();
00110       #endif
00111 
00112       // If master processor
00113       if (rank == 0) {
00114 
00115          // Default cacheCapacity_ = (# processors)*(max atoms per send)
00116          if (cacheCapacity_ <= 0) {
00117             cacheCapacity_ = gridSize * sendCapacity_;
00118          }
00119 
00120          // Allocate memory for array of atoms on the master processor. 
00121          cache_.allocate(cacheCapacity_);
00122          reservoir_.allocate(cacheCapacity_);
00123 
00124          // Push all atoms onto the reservoir stack, in reverse order.
00125          for (int i = cacheCapacity_ - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00126             reservoir_.push(cache_[i]);
00127          }
00128 
00129          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00130          // Allocate memory for sendArrays_ matrix, and nullify all elements.
00131          sendArrays_.allocate(gridSize, sendCapacity_);
00132          sendSizes_.allocate(gridSize);
00133          for (int i = 0; i < gridSize; ++i) {
00134             sendSizes_[i] = 0; 
00135             for (int j = 0; j < sendCapacity_; ++j) {
00136                sendArrays_(i, j) = 0;      
00137             }
00138          }
00139          #endif
00140 
00141       }
00142 
00143    }
00144 
00145    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00146    /*
00147    * Initialize the send buffer.
00148    */ 
00149    void AtomDistributor::setup() 
00150    {  
00151       bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer(); 
00152       bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::ATOM); 
00153    }
00154    #endif

00156    /*
00157    * Returns address for a new local Atom.
00158    */ 
00159    Atom* AtomDistributor::newAtomPtr()
00160    {
00161       // Preconditions
00162       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00163          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not initialized");
00164       }
00165       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00166       if (bufferPtr_ == 0) {
00167          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not initialized");
00168       }
00169       #endif
00170       if (cacheCapacity_ <= 0) {
00171          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not allocated");
00172       }
00173       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized() != 0) {
00174          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00175       }
00176       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() != 0) {
00177          UTIL_THROW("This is not the master processor");
00178       }
00179       if (newPtr_ != 0) {
00180          UTIL_THROW("A newPtr_ is still active");
00181       }
00182 
00183       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00184       // If reservoir is empty, send buffer to processor with maximum sendSize_
00185       if (reservoir_.size() == 0) {
00186 
00187          int rank  = rankMaxSendSize_;
00188          int size  = sendSizes_[rank];
00189          int nSend = std::min(size, sendCapacity_);
00190          int begin = size - nSend;
00191 
00192          // Pack atoms into buffer, and return pointers for reuse.
00193          for (int i = begin; i < size; ++i) {
00194             bufferPtr_->packAtom(*sendArrays_(rank, i));
00195 
00196             // Return pointer to the reservoir and remove it from sendArrays_.
00197             reservoir_.push(*sendArrays_(rank, i));
00198             sendArrays_(rank, i) = 0;
00199          }
00200          bool isComplete = false;
00201          bufferPtr_->endSendBlock(isComplete);
00202          nSentTotal_ += sendSizes_[rank];
00203          sendSizes_[rank] = begin;
00204 
00205          // Send the buffer
00206          bufferPtr_->send(domainPtr_->communicator(), rank);
00207 
00208          // Reinitialize the buffer for reuse.
00209          bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00210          bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::ATOM);
00211       }
00212       #endif
00213 
00214       // Return pointer to new atom.
00215       newPtr_ = &reservoir_.pop();
00216       return newPtr_;
00217    }
00218 
00219    /*
00220    * Add an atom to the list to be sent.
00221    */ 
00222    int AtomDistributor::addAtom() 
00223    {
00224       // Preconditions
00225       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00226          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not initialized");
00227       }
00228       if (boundaryPtr_ == 0) {
00229          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not initialized");
00230       }
00231       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized() != 0) {
00232          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00233       }
00234       if (cacheCapacity_ <= 0) {
00235          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not allocated");
00236       }
00237       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() != 0) {
00238          UTIL_THROW("This is not the master processor");
00239       }
00240       if (newPtr_ == 0) {
00241          UTIL_THROW("No active newPtr_");
00242       }
00243 
00244       // Shift position to lie within boundary.
00245       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00246          boundaryPtr_->shift(newPtr_->position());
00247       } else {
00248          boundaryPtr_->shiftGen(newPtr_->position());
00249       }
00250 
00251       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00252       // Identify rank of processor that owns this atom.
00253       int rank = domainPtr_->ownerRank(newPtr_->position());
00254       #else
00255       int rank = 0;
00256       #endif
00257 
00258       // If not owned by the master, queue this atom for sending.
00259       if (rank == 0) {
00260 
00261          Atom* ptr = storagePtr_->newAtomPtr();
00262          *ptr = *newPtr_;
00263          storagePtr_->addNewAtom();
00264 
00265          reservoir_.push(*newPtr_); 
00266 
00267       }
00268       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00269       else { // if rank !=0
00270 
00271          // Add newPtr_ to array of pointers for processor rank.
00272          assert(sendSizes_[rank] < sendCapacity_);
00273          sendArrays_(rank, sendSizes_[rank]) = newPtr_;
00274          ++sendSizes_[rank];
00275          ++nCachedTotal_;
00276 
00277          // Check if sendSize for this rank is the largest.
00278          if (rank != rankMaxSendSize_) {
00279             if (sendSizes_[rank] > sendSizes_[rankMaxSendSize_]) {
00280                rankMaxSendSize_ = rank;
00281             }
00282          }
00283  
00284          // If buffer for the relevant processor is full, send it now.
00285          if (sendSizes_[rank] == sendCapacity_) {
00286 
00287             // Pack atoms into buffer, and return pointers for reuse.
00288             for (int i = 0; i < sendCapacity_; ++i) {
00289                bufferPtr_->packAtom(*sendArrays_(rank, i));
00290 
00291                // Push pointer onto reservoir and remove it from sendArrays_.
00292                reservoir_.push(*sendArrays_(rank, i));
00293                sendArrays_(rank, i) = 0;
00294             }
00295             bool isComplete = false;
00296             bufferPtr_->endSendBlock(isComplete);
00297             nSentTotal_ += sendCapacity_;
00298             sendSizes_[rank] = 0;
00299 
00300             // Send the buffer
00301             bufferPtr_->send(domainPtr_->communicator(), rank);
00302 
00303             // Reinitialize the send buffer for reuse.
00304             bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00305             bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::ATOM);
00306          }
00307 
00308       }
00309       #endif
00310 
00311       // Nullify newPtr_ to release for reuse.
00312       newPtr_ = 0;
00313 
00314       // Return rank of processor that owns this atom.
00315       return rank;
00316 
00317    }
00318 
00319    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00320    /*
00321    * Send any atoms that have not be sent previously.
00322    *
00323    * This method should be called only by the master processor.
00324    */
00325    void AtomDistributor::send()
00326    {
00327 
00328       // Preconditions
00329       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00330          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not initialized");
00331       }
00332       if (boundaryPtr_ == 0) {
00333          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not initialized");
00334       }
00335       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized() != 0) {
00336          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00337       }
00338       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() != 0) {
00339          UTIL_THROW("This is not the master processor");
00340       }
00341       if (newPtr_ != 0) {
00342          UTIL_THROW("A newPtr_ is still active");
00343       }
00344 
00345       int gridSize = domainPtr_->grid().size();
00346       int i, j;
00347       bool isComplete = true;
00348       for (i = 1; i < gridSize; ++i) {
00349 
00350          // Pack all remaining atoms for this processor
00351          for (j = 0; j < sendSizes_[i]; ++j) {
00352             bufferPtr_->packAtom(*sendArrays_(i, j));
00353 
00354             // Return pointer to atom to the reservoir.
00355             reservoir_.push(*sendArrays_(i, j));
00356 
00357          }
00358          bufferPtr_->endSendBlock(isComplete);
00359          nSentTotal_ += sendSizes_[i];
00360 
00361          // Send buffer, with isComplete flag as true.
00362          bufferPtr_->send(domainPtr_->communicator(), i);
00363 
00364          // Clear buffer and initialize for resending.
00365          bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00366          if (i < gridSize - 1) {
00367             bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::ATOM);
00368          }
00369 
00370          // Reset send arrays to empty state.
00371          for (int j = 0; j < sendCapacity_; ++j) {
00372             sendArrays_(i, j) = 0;
00373          }
00374          sendSizes_[i] = 0;
00375       }
00376 
00377       // Compute total number of atoms on all processors.
00378       storagePtr_->computeNAtomTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00379 
00380       // Postconditions
00381       if (reservoir_.size() != reservoir_.capacity()) {
00382          UTIL_THROW("atomReservoir not empty after final send");
00383       }
00384       if (nCachedTotal_ != nSentTotal_) {
00385          UTIL_THROW("Number cached atoms != number sent");
00386       }
00387       if (storagePtr_->nAtomTotal() != nSentTotal_ + storagePtr_->nAtom()) {
00388          UTIL_THROW("Number atoms received != number sent + nAtom on master");
00389       }
00390 
00391       nCachedTotal_ = 0;
00392       nSentTotal_   = 0;
00393    }
00394    #endif
00395 
00396    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00397    /*
00398    * Receive all atoms sent by the master processor.
00399    *
00400    * Called by all processors except the master.
00401    */ 
00402    void AtomDistributor::receive()
00403    {
00404       Atom* ptr;                 // Ptr to atom for storage
00405       int   rank;                // Rank of this processor
00406       const int source = 0;      // Rank of source processor
00407       bool  isComplete = false;  // Have all atoms been received?
00408 
00409       // Preconditions
00410       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00411          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor is not initialized");
00412       }
00413       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized() != 0) {
00414          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00415       }
00416       rank = domainPtr_->gridRank();
00417       if (rank == 0) {
00418          UTIL_THROW("AtomDistributor::receive() called on master processor");
00419       }
00420 
00421       while (!isComplete) {
00422 
00423          // Receive a buffer
00424          bufferPtr_->recv(domainPtr_->communicator(), source);
00425 
00426          // Unpack the buffer
00427          isComplete = bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
00428          while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
00429             ptr = storagePtr_->newAtomPtr();
00430             bufferPtr_->unpackAtom(*ptr);
00431             storagePtr_->addNewAtom();
00432             if (domainPtr_->ownerRank(ptr->position()) != rank) {
00433                UTIL_THROW("Error: Atom on wrong processor");
00434             }
00435          }
00436 
00437       }
00438 
00439       // Compute total number of atoms on all processors.
00440       storagePtr_->computeNAtomTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00441    }
00442    #endif
00443 
00444 }
00445 #endif
